      void drawPowerUp()
      asks the server to draw a powerup
      void endTurn()
      asks the server to end the turn
      void finishCard()
      informs the server that the user does not want to do anything else with the card he was playing

      asks the server for the possible effects of a weapon card

    • Method Detail

      • getValidActions

        public void getValidActions()
        asks the server for the valid actions

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect()
        asks the server for a reconnection

      • drawPowerUp

        public void drawPowerUp()
        asks the server to draw a powerup

      • run

        public void run​(TurnEvent runType,
                Square square)
        asks the server to run in another square
        Parameters:
        runType - the run types decides in which squares you can run
        square - the destination square

      • spawn

        public void spawn​(PowerUpCard powerUpCard)
        asks the server to spawn a player
        Parameters:
        powerUpCard - the powerup to discard when spawning

      • grab

        public void grab​(WeaponCard drawn,
                 WeaponCard toRelease,
                 PowerUpCard powerUpCard)
        asks the server to grab either an ammo or a weapon
        Parameters:
        drawn - the weapon to draw, null for ammos
        toRelease - the weapons to release, null for ammos or if you have less than 3 weapons in your hand
        powerUpCard - the powerup card to pay with, can always be null

      • getEffects

        public void getEffects​(WeaponCard weaponCard)
        asks the server for the possible effects of a weapon card
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - the card you are playing

      • playPowerUp

        public void playPowerUp​(PowerUpCard powerUpCard,
                        Ammo whichAmmo,
                        PowerUpCard payWithThis)
        asks the server to play a powerup card
        Parameters:
        powerUpCard - the powerup card to play
        whichAmmo - the ammo to pay, if the powerup has a price. it must be exactly 1 cube of any color or null
        payWithThis - the powerup used to pay instead of the ammo

      • playEffect

        public void playEffect​(Effect effect,
                       PowerUpCard powerUpCard)
        plays the chosen effect of a weapon card
        Parameters:
        effect - the effect to play
        powerUpCard - the powerup card to pay for the effect

      • finishCard

        public void finishCard()
        informs the server that the user does not want to do anything else with the card he was playing

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        asks the server to end the turn

      • tagElement

        public void tagElement​(Taggable selected,
                       boolean shooting)
        asks the server to tag an element, either with a weapon or with a powerup
        Parameters:
        selected - the element to tag
        shooting - if true you are using a weapon, if false a powerup
